alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 7:16PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN ST. LOUIS AND SOUTHWESTERN LAKE COUNTIES... At 715 PM CST, moderate to heavy snow showers were along a line extending from 7 miles north of Fairbanks, to Virginia, to near Chisholm, and moving southeast at 30 mph. Visibilities of 1/2 mile or less, wind gusts up to 25 mph, and rapid snow accumulation on roads are expected with these moderate to heavy snow showers. These moderate to heavy snow showers will be near... Hibbing, Virginia, Chisholm, Eveleth, Mountain Iron, Gilbert, and Buhl around 720 PM CST. Cherry and Fairbanks around 725 PM CST. Whiteface Reservoir around 730 PM CST. Wolf Lake around 735 PM CST. Brimson around 740 PM CST. Highland Lake and Thomas Lake Near Brimson around 745 PM CST. Cotton around 800 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these moderate to heavy snow showers include Comstock Lake, Franklin, Iron Junction, Kinney, Seven Beaver Lake, Wales, Kelsey, Shaw, Little Swan, and Leonidas. Be prepared for changing visibility and road conditions. Reduce your speed and allow more space between you and the vehicle in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Lake, North Shore
